Subject:   	FW: [Fwd: FW: [ADMINS] Infringement of Quiksilver Copyrights and TrademarksIncluding Quiksilver, Roxy and DC Shoes]
From:   	"Copyright" <Copyrightold@theplanet.com>
Date:   	Fri, December 8, 2006 12:35 pm
To:   	lawfirm@sw-law.com
Cc:   	Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Options:   	View Full Header |  View Printable Version  | Download this as a file | Whitelist Sender | Add to Addressbook

 
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] Infringement of Quiksilver Copyrights and
TrademarksIncluding Quiksilver, Roxy and DC Shoes
Date: Wed, 6 Dec 2006 10:42:02 -0600
From: Ryan Carter <rcarter@theplanet.com>
To: Legal <Legal@theplanet.com>

From: Shaub & Williams LLP [lawfirm@sw-law.com]
Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2006 6:22 PM
To: Admins; abuse; lcrosby@theplanet.com
Cc: 'Leslie'; admin@sw-law.com
Subject: [ADMINS] Infringement of Quiksilver Copyrights and
TrademarksIncluding Quiksilver, Roxy and DC Shoes

Dear Sir or Madam,
    Please see the attached cease and desist letter regarding
infringment of Quiksilver's Copyrights and Tradmarks at
Brandsoftheworld.com (67.19.36.20).

Very truly yours,

Lisbeth Bosshart, Esq.
SHAUB & WILLIAMS LLP
12121 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 205
Los Angeles, California 90025
tel. (310) 826-6678
fax. (310) 826-8042
e-mail: lawfirm@sw-law.com

This e-mail may contain CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY INFORMATION and/or
PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL ATTORNEY-CLIENT COMMUNICATION AND/OR WORK
PRODUCT intended solely for the recipient and, therefore, may not be
retransmitted to any party outside of the recipient's organization
without the prior written consent of the sender. If you have received
this e-mail in error, please notify the sender immediately by telephone
or reply e-mail and destroy the original message without making a copy.
